argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_rexr | |- ( B e. RR -> B e. RR* ) |
| 2 |  | #P_xnegneg | |- ( B e. RR* -> -e -e B = B ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_syl | |- ( B e. RR -> -e -e B = B ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( A e. RR* /\ B e. RR ) -> -e -e B = B ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( A e. RR* /\ B e. RR ) -> ( ( A +e -e B ) +e -e -e B ) = ( ( A +e -e B ) +e B ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_rexneg | |- ( B e. RR -> -e B = -u B ) |
| 7 |  | #P_renegcl | |- ( B e. RR -> -u B e. RR ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( B e. RR -> -e B e. RR ) |
| 9 |  | #P_xpncan | |- ( ( A e. RR* /\ -e B e. RR ) -> ( ( A +e -e B ) +e -e -e B ) = A ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( A e. RR* /\ B e. RR ) -> ( ( A +e -e B ) +e -e -e B ) = A ) |
| 11 | 5, 10 | #P_eqtr3d | |- ( ( A e. RR* /\ B e. RR ) -> ( ( A +e -e B ) +e B ) = A ) |
